## Applies To ##
* Ruby
## Solution Example ##
~~~~ #! /usr/bin/env ruby if ARGV.length == 0 puts "Usage: #{$0} [username]" exit end
def verifyUsername(username) # Length: between 3 - 20 chars if username.length < 3 or username.length > 20 return false end # Alphanumeric ascii characters only if not username =~ /\A[a-zA-Z0-9]+\z/ return false end return true end
if verifyUsername(ARGV[0]) puts "Username is valid." else puts "Username is invalid." end ~~~~
